56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Musa:Abu 'Amir was hit with an arrow in his knee, so I went to him and he asked me to remove the arrow. When I removed it, the water started dribbling from it. Then I went to the Prophet (ﷺ) and told him about it. He said, "O Allah! Forgive `Ubaid Abu 'Amir

chapter.eng-name: Removing the arrow from the body
